Package mygame.multiplayer.services

package mygame.multiplayer.services
Services used by the server and clients for communication

    Description

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Connection
    A Connection is the way the server and clients signal to each other that they are still active.
    Connection.ConnectionMonitor
    A PublisherService that monitors a connection.
    DirectoryMonitor
    Monitors changes in a directory.
    FileMonitor
    Monitors changes in a file.
    Monitor<T>
    An abstract PublisherService that periodically polls something and calls the callbacks with the result if there is an update.
    Monitor.When
    Wrapper class for all monitors used in this program, with the purpose to make the code more readable.
    PublisherService<T>
    An abstract implementation of Publisher and Service.
    Scheduler
    Utility class for service-related operations.
